definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: 13 consider well her ramparts, view her citadels, that you may tell of them to the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 细看他的外郭，察看他的宫殿，为要传说到后代。

sentences.english: Mrs Pipchin's grey eye scanned his thoughtful face.
sentences.chinese: 皮普钦太太的灰色眼睛细看着他的若有所思的脸孔。

sentences.english: You should read over your test paper before handing it in.
sentences.chinese: 你应当将试卷从头至尾细看一遍再交。

sentences.english: With an eye to look different, carefully thinking is very different.
sentences.chinese: 用眼细看不一样，用心多思很不同。

sentences.english: Even before he got a close look, he knew that he would return to the water.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还没有细看，他就已经知道他要回到水里去。

sentences.english: I lean against the railing, staring at the firefly.
sentences.chinese: 我凭依栏杆，细看那萤火虫。

sentences.english: PEER】She peered through the mist, trying to find the right way.
sentences.chinese: 她透过雾中细看，想找到正确的路。
我好奇地细看着这武器。

sentences.english: Only one serious piece Guzi pretending to scan.
sentences.chinese: 只是顾自装作认真的一件件细看。

sentences.english: She saw the wayfarer , and perceived what he was looking at.
sentences.chinese: 她望着过路客人，看见了他正在细看的东西。

sentences.english: Colsing him or her, you can see the scars above eight or nine in their bodies.
sentences.chinese: 走近细看，有的树身竟是八九个以上的疤痕。

sentences.english: We peered through the fog at the house numbers.
sentences.chinese: 我们透过雾气细看门牌号码。

sentences.english: B: Yes, so you’d better look over our specifications.
sentences.chinese: 是的，所以您最好先把我们的规格说明细看一遍。

sentences.english: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
sentences.chinese: 细看他的外郭，察看他的宫殿，为要传说到后代。

sentences.english: CCTV reporter Yuan Xiaoyuan takes a closer look at the disputes unfolding in the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中央电视台记者袁晓园为我们细看中国南海争端。

definition: to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to appear before one's eyes/pleasing to the eye/nice to look at
to drill or bore a hole/to attract attention/conspicuous
